title: Xiaomi
slug: xiaomi
description: Xiaomi Corporation is a Chinese electronics company founded in
  April 2010 and headquartered in Beijing. Xiaomi makes and invests in
  smartphones, mobile apps, laptops, bags, earphones, shoes, fitness bands, and
  many other products.
